beliefs.action: I won't let Jericho out of my sight until I know more about what is going on. If I do, I will surely be lost in this new world.

relationships.name: Bishop Ambrose Rookwood
relationships.description: Venal Priest who tolerates William because of his cheap stolen goods. Lives in the City District.

affiliations.name: The Windmill Gang
affiliations.description: Group of criminals who work in the Windmill Theater by day. They have a reputation as smugglers, forgers and as a fence.

aliases.name: Bertie Smalls
aliases.description: Reporter at Large (Introduces himself whenever leaving). Brilliant Fake ID

titles.name: Captain of the Neighborhood Watch
titles.description: Leads the neighborhood watch in St Thomas parish & Leason with the Guards of Northwall

funds.name: Empire Minerals & Coal
funds.description: Vertical monopoly on coal, iron, steel & transportation

spells.name: Nightmare for One
spells.description: Target is distracted by terrifying illusions for 1 test. Vs Perception +1 (or 2 for full combat)

notes.name: The Theater Burns
notes.description: William burned the theater down to cover the tracks of the demon taint.

beliefs.core: Circles are power. In this city it's often not what you know, but who you know.
beliefs.action: As soon as the ritual is completed, I need to find us a Korian guide to help us sneak into the concert without raising any alarms.

instincts.description: Always aim for the simplest solution.

traits.name: Predatory
traits.description: You instinctively prey on the weaknesses of others

beliefs.core: A good detective finds and exploits the inevitable mistakes while minimizing his own.
beliefs.action: We've just had an open fire-fight near a slum in martial law -- we have to clear the vicinity ASAP before either local muscle arrives, or worse, the Omnisiah's minions. If we can't complete the ritual immidiately we will have to abort, it's not as important as the Skald
